scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && node index.js
scripts.pretest: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:create
scripts.clean: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
